greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A257505.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5050
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (Scheme) (define (A257506 n) (let ((row (A257681 n)) (col (A257679 n))) (* (/ 1 2) (- (expt (+ row col) 2) row col col col -2))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 06 2015
